name: Hotel Della Torre Argentina
description: Hotel della Torre Argentina is an elegant historic building in the centre of Rome, 2 minutes' walk from the market in Campo de Fiori square. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a flat-screen satellite TV. The hotel features a panoramic terrace with chairs and tables, offering views of Rome's rooftops. The building dates back to the 18th century, and is complete with a lift. The interiors are classically decorated, and rooms come with carpeted or parquet floors. A sweet and savoury buffet is served daily in the breakfast room, which features brick walls, arches, and vaulted ceilings. Della Torre Argentina Hotel is right in front a bus stop providing direct links to Roma Termini Train Station.

name: CC Palace Hotel
description: This smoke-free inn features a rooftop terrace, concierge services, and a 24-hour front desk. WiFi in public areas is free. Additionally, tour/ticket assistance, multilingual staff, and a porter/bellhop are onsite. Change of towels is available on request.Expedia

name: Dotcampus Roma City Center
description: No description found

name: Hotel Nova Domus Aurelia
description: Located in Rome, 1.8 km from St. Peter's Basilica, Hotel Nova Domus Aurelia provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Vatican Museums. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms at Hotel Nova Domus Aurelia include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hotel Nova Domus Aurelia include Ottaviano Metro Station, St Peter's Square and The Vatican. The nearest airport is Fiumicino Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: Tb Place Roma
description: No description found

name: Grand Hotel Fleming
description: Discover a quieter, residential part of Rome at Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels. Located 10 minutes' drive from the Auditorium, Olympic Stadium and Foro Italico, it offers good transport links to city centre. Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels is conveniently close to Rome's GRA ring road and the motorway, making travelling around the area easy. Buses pass by nearby to take you to the Vatican, 15 minutes' drive away, from where you can catch the Metro across the city. Comfortable, affordable rooms at the Fleming come with satellite television and minibar, and many have their own balcony. Enjoy a few drinks at the bar or go to Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels's restaurant for Italian and international meals at dinner.

name: Martis Palace Hotel
description: Located in the Navona district in the heart of Rome, 50 metres from Piazza Navona, Hotel Martis Palace features a terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All soundproofed rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms are equipped with a large shower. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and slippers. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Martis Palace offers several common spaces where guests can relax: a library, a bar and a restaurant where breakfast is also served. The property also boasts a large roof terrace overlooking the whole city. Guests benefit from a discount at a spa under the same ownership and set only 100 metres from the property. Campo de' Fiori is 200 metres from Hotel Martis Palace, while Pantheon is 300 metres away. Rome Ciampino Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: Palazzo Navona Hotel
description: Just 100 metres from Piazza Navona square, the 4-star Palazzo Navona Hotel is set in the heart of Rome. It offers free WiFi throughout, a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with modern décor. These rooms feature a minibar, electric kettle, and flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels. Each has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. Palazzo Navona is 300 metres from the Pantheon. Castel Sant'Angelo castle is less than a 15-minute walk away.

name: Residenza Scipioni Luxury Rooms
description: No description found

name: Mood44
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and a rainfall showerhead, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, a Select Comfort bed, down comforters, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Rome Life Hotel
description: Conveniently situated, Rome Life Hotel offers easy access to Rome's popular hot spots. This modern hotel is an ideal choice for exploring the local vineyards as it is located in the Latium Wine Region. There are a variety of facilities on offer to guests of Rome Life Hotel, such as babysitting/child services, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Just moments from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. For guests' comfort, all rooms at Rome Life Hotel are both soundproofed and air conditioned. They provide tea and coffee making facilities, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Those staying at the hotel can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, ideally based for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. Each evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the breakfast room, or there is a range of well-known eateries in the area to discover. Rome Life Hotel is within walking distance of Trevi Fountain, Colosseum and Roman Forum. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Rome.Revato

name: Singer Palace Hotel
description: Boasting a rooftop restaurant, Singer Palace Hotel is located right on the famous Via del Corso shopping Street. Set 350 metres from Trevi Fountain, the property offers air-conditioned rooms. Featuring an elegant décor, all rooms have satellite flat-screen TV, while some rooms come with a seating area. The private bathroom is equipped with bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries. À la carte homemade breakfast is available daily with fresh products. Guests can also enjoy Italian cuisine and seafood dishes for lunch and dinner. Pantheon is a 5-minute walk from the property, while Piazza Venezia is 300 metres away. Rome Ciampino airport is 40 minutes' drive from the Singer Palace Hotel.

name: Hotel Colosseum
description: Hotel Colosseum is set in a quiet street in the city centre. The roof terrace offers unforgettable views of ancient Rome. The Coliseum and the Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica are just a short walk away. All rooms at the Colosseum Hotel are air-conditioned, and come with a satellite TV and elegant parquet floors. The private bathrooms are complete with bath or shower, hairdryer, and toiletries. Breakfast is a varied buffet.

name: Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & Restaurant
description: Just metres from Rome's Trevi Fountain, Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & Restaurant offers modern rooms and a restaurant. WiFi is free throughout. All air conditioned, rooms here come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, parquet floors, and a minibar. Some rooms include a seating area. The private bathroom has bathrobes, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. Barberini Metro is 550 metres form the property, while the Quirinale is 5 minutes' walk away. Rome Ciampino Airport is 20 km from Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & restaurant. The museum, La città dell'Acqua - Vicus Caprarius is 50 metres from the property.

name: The One Boutique Hotel & Spa Rome
description: A 3-minute walk from Piazza Barberini and 300 metres from the Trevi Fountain, THE ONE Boutique Hotel Cocktail bar & SPA Roma offers modern-style rooms with design furniture in the heart of Rome. WiFi throughout is included. At this adults-only hotel, rooms feature a Smart TV, a Nespresso® coffee machine and air conditioning. Some rooms come with city views, while all rooms have a suspended bed and a fully equipped private bathroom. An American breakfast is available daily. Aperitifs, cocktails and snacks are available at the b-cool | bakery & bar. The Spanish Steps and Barberini Metro Station are both 5-minute walk from the hotel. Rome's Fiumicino International Airport is a 35-minute drive away.

name: Best Western Hotel Artdeco
description: Special Protection, our commitment to ensuring a safe stay with strict cleaning and sanitization protocols. Technologies to support the interaction with the staff to promote social distancing. Protective equipment and safety procedures for staff and guests. The Best Western Hotel Artdeco is located in the city center, between Via Veneto and the train station. The hotel is connected to the air terminal via the Catro Pretorio subway stop. Some of the amenities enjoyed by guests include deco furnishings and a restaurant serving international and regional cuisine. Enjoy your stay. This property has joined the Stay for the Planet project. It undertakes to manage the hotel activities in a sustainable manner by monitoring consumptions, reducing the presence of disposable plastic, taking energy efficiency actions for a positive impact on the environment. **Restaurant temporarily closed**bestwestern.com

name: Corso 281 Luxury Suites
description: Corso 281 Luxury Suites offers modern accommodation located in Roma, 200 metres from Piazza Venezia. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas. Each air-conditioned suite will provide you with a flat-screen TV, a Nespresso machine and a minibar. Featuring free Bulgari toiletries, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Some studios feature an equipped kitchenette and a furnished balcony. Breakfast features a sweet or a savoury option and it is served directly in your room. The Coliseum is a 15-minute walk from Corso 281 Luxury Suites. Trevi Fountain is 550 metres away.

name: Albergo Ottocento
description: Located just 200 metres from Barberini Metro Station, Albergo Ottocento is a 5-minute walk from the Trevi Fountain. The elegant rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The Ottocento's continental breakfast buffet includes fresh pastries. The bar serves international cocktails, and dinner is available on the terrace during summer. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout the Ottocento Hotel. Guests can also benefit from discounted rates at the nearby Rossini restaurant.

name: Hotel Forum
description: This 4-star Hotel is set in an 18th-century building opposite the Roman Forum, between the Coliseum and Piazza Venezia. The restaurant serves Roman and international specialities, and its terrace offers unique views of the Eternal City. Rooms at Hotel Forum have an elegant design with luxurious fabrics and furnishings, parquet floors, and comfortable beds. All air-conditioned, they also feature a satellite TV, a minibar, and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available. The lobby features Persian rugs and wainscot panelling. The bar serves international cocktails. A generous breakfast is available each morning on the rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the city. The Forum Hotel is next to the Church of Santi Quirico e Giulitta, and 500 metres from Colosseo Metro Station on line B.

name: Sentho Roma
description: Sentho Roma features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Rome. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 400 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore, 500 metres from Cavour Metro Station and less than 1 km from Colosseo Metro Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every room has a kettle, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. All units include a wardrobe. A continental, Italian or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near Sentho Roma include Quirinal Hill, Domus Aurea and Rome Termini Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Fellini
description: Set 300 metres from the Trevi Fountain, Hotel Fellini offers free high-speed WiFi throughout and air-conditioned rooms. The Spanish Steps are 550 metres away. This hotel offers a sweet and savoury continental breakfast. This morning treat is served at the property’s breakfast room, located in the same building, with a separate entrance. Barberini Metro is 250 metres from the property.

name: Hotel Degli Artisti
description: Hotel Degli Artisti offers free WiFi throughout and luxuriously furnished rooms in the heart of Rome. This hotel set in a historical building along a quiet yet central street and also features a bar. All rooms are air conditioned and soundproofed, and have a private bathroom with toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer. Each room combines modern amenities such as a minibar and a flat-screen satellite TV with classic-style touches and parquet floors. A sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is prepared daily including cold cuts, cheese, eggs, and sausages. The on-site bar is available for drinks and light meals from 16:00 until 23:00. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Hotel Degli Artisti is a 5-minute walk from the Trevi Fountain, while the Spanish Steps are 300 metres away.

name: Exe International Palace
description: Set in a beautiful 19th-century building, Exe International Palace is a hotel with free WiFi set across the road from Rome's Opera Theatre. Its elegant rooms feature air conditioning and satellite TV. Exe International Palace is 400 metres from Repubblica Metro Station, and a 10-minute walk from Termini Train Station. The Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain are also within walking distance. The hotel's International Cafè restaurant serves typical local products combined with intense fragrances and aromas. Breakfast is an American buffet. The bar is open till late at night and offers tasty snacks and excellent cocktails prepared by the skilled barman.

name: Hotel Royal Bissolati
description: Set 300 metres from Barberini Metro Station, Royal Bissolati is located in Rome. The hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and an on-site bar. WiFi is free throughout. All units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, toiletries and a hairdryer. A continental buffet-style breakfast is available every morning. The Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain are both 1 km away. Villa borghese is a 15-minute walk from the property. Rome Ciampino Airport is 16 km from Royal Bissolati.

name: Hotel Santa Costanza
description: Hotel Santa Costanza by OMNIA hotels is located in north-eastern Rome, a 10-minute walk from Bologna Metro Station. It enjoys good bus links with Termini Station and has free Wi-Fi. Rooms are simply decorated and feature either wood or light-coloured furniture, artwork and mostly wood floors. Facilities include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a complete private bathroom. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can recommend sights in the surrounding and organise city tours. The Santa Costanza is next to a bus stop, providing quick links with Rome Termini Station in 10 minutes.

name: The Hive Hotel
description: Featuring a shared rooftop terrace, The Hive Hotel is 300 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica. The hotel provides free WiFi throughout and air-conditioned rooms. All rooms at this property have a modern-style décor, and come with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with slippers, toiletries and a hairdryer, while some also include a seating area. An extensive sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is available daily. Guests can also find a bar and a restaurant serving Italian and Chinese cuisine. Domus Aurea is 1 km from the hotel, while Quirinale is a 20-minute walk away. Fiumicino International Airport is 30 km from The Hive.

name: Hotel Windrose
description: Hotel Windrose offers superior 3-star accommodation only 5 minutes' walk from Termini Station. Staff here are friendly and professional and the hotel has its own outdoor terrace. You can walk across Rome to the Coliseum or the Spanish Steps from here. Metro and bus links are close by. Offering free Wi-Fi, all of the Windrose's rooms come with air conditioning and heating. They include satellite TV, a minibar, safe and marble bathroom. A buffet breakfast is available each morning.

name: Hotel Capo d'Africa - Colosseo
description: Surrounded by traditional trattorias and wine bars, the luxurious Capo D’Africa is just 5 minutes' walk from the Coliseum. Breakfast, drinks and snacks are served up on its rooftop terrace. Featuring Italian contemporary art and modern décor, rooms here are all air conditioned. They also come with a minibar and a TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Guests have a gym and free Wi-Fi. Breakfast is buffet style served on the roof-top terrace, cocktails and wines are available from the Centrum Bar. The L'Attico restaurant offers an à la carte menu of traditional Roman and national cuisine. Hotel Capo D’Africa provides free city maps and excellent service. Colosseo Metro Station is 5 minutes' away on foot and there are also great bus links around Rome. In the surrounding narrow streets you have a great variety of ice cream parlours, pizzerias and restaurants.

name: Margutta 19 - Small Luxury Hotels Of The World
description: Margutta 19 combines high-end Italian contemporary design with serene elegance, and is a haven to return to after exploring the splendors of Rome.Relax while sipping a cocktail against an emerald-green backdrop of Borghese gardens, eat at hotel restaurant EMME, a tribute to our culinary tradition with a modern twist, featuring seasonal local ingredients and creative pairings.EMME takes traditional regional dishes to a higher level thanks to our highly trained chefs, cutting-edge cooking methods and unique fresh flavors. The menu spans from traditional delicacies to raw fish specialties paired with a vast selection of wines and freshly made cocktails.iHotelier/iStay

name: Domus Libera
description: No description found

name: Twentyone Hotel
description: The Twentyone is a modern boutique hotel on Via Cola di Rienzo, one of Rome's best shopping streets. Castel Sant'Angelo and the historic centre are just a pleasant 10-minute walk away. Rooms at the Twentyone Hotel are ultra modern and feature a minimalist décor. They offer an LCD satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, and free WiFi. A continental buffet is available in a bright breakfast room. Open for lunch and dinner, the on-site restaurant serves traditional Roman and classic Italian dishes and a large selection of wines and champagne. The hotel is in the elegant Prati district, home to the Vatican and Saint Peter's Basilica, which are a 15-minute walk away. Lepanto Metro Station is 450 metres from the property, while bus links to Roma Termini Train Station are located close by.

name: Camplus Hotel Roma Centro
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Rome, Camplus Hotel Roma Centro provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 500 metres from Rome Termini Metro Station. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Camplus Hotel Roma Centro each room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, Spanish, French and Italian. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rome Termini Train Station, Repubblica - Teatro dell'Opera Metro Station and Santa Maria Maggiore. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from Camplus Hotel Roma Centro.

name: Residenza Roma Centro
description: No description found

name: Suite Opera Rooms
description: No description found

name: 47 Boutique Hotel
description: Boasting a panoramic rooftop restaurant, Fortyseven is in the historic centre of Rome, 350 metres from the Bocca della Verità sculpture. It features a gym, steam bath, and rooms with parquet floors. Air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Fortyseven include a satellite LCD TV with Netflix and Sky, safe, minibar and Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathroom has soft bathrobes, slippers, and a hairdryer. Wi-Fi is free throughout. A continental breakfast is served daily at the buffet, while creative Mediterranean cuisine is served at the restaurant, 47 Circus Roof Garden. Guests can enjoy a cocktail at the 47 Circus Roof Garden bar, open every day until midnight. Teatro Marcello is 300 metres away, while the Jewish Ghetto is reachable on foot in around 5 minutes.

name: Rome Times Hotel
description: Strategically located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Rome. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. For families Rome Times Hotel offers babysitting/child services. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Rome Times Hotel offer a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room safe, a laptop safe and an in-room closet. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning, and there are also numerous restaurants and cafés close by. Rome Times Hotel is conveniently located for discovering Rome with Quirinal Palace within a 10-minute walk. It is also moments from the Latium Wine Region.Revato

name: Otivm Hotel
description: Situated in Rome, a short walk from Palazzo Venezia, Otivm Hotel features concierge service, a 24-hour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can also relax on the terrace. All air conditioned, guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a small fridge and free toiletries. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available each morning at Otivm Hotel. Synagogue of Rome is 500 metres from the hotel. Rome Ciampino Airport is 20 km from the property.

name: Rome Marriott Grand Hotel Flora
description: Immerse in your personal Dolce Vita at the Rome Marriott Grand Hotel Flora, right on top of the noble Via Veneto and next door to the Villa Borghese gardens and the 2000 year old historic Roman walls. This gracious edifice with the stylish decor capturing the grandeur of Neoclassicism is exclusively designed for those looking for refined luxury in an atmosphere of sophistication and the highest level of welcoming hospitality anticipating every need of today's business or leisure traveller. Just sink back in the timeless elegance of the superbly appointed and newly refurbished rooms and suites. Delight in the culinary highlights of the Mediterranean cuisine at the Flora Restaurant. The adjoining bar is the ideal place to meet, to see or be seen, or to take in the flamboyant atmosphere of Via Veneto. The Flora Roof Top Terrace is the perfect setting for wedding receptions and exclusive celebrations, or simply for admiring the enchanting view over the roofs.Marriott

name: Apollo Boutique Hotel
description: Situated in Rome and with Lepanto Metro Station reachable within 300 metres, Apollo Boutique Hotel features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. A continental, Italian or vegan breakfast is available each morning at the property. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ottaviano Metro Station, Piazza del Popolo and Castel Sant'Angelo. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 17 km from Apollo Boutique Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Stendhal
description: Just 100 metres from Barberini Metro Station, the Stendhal is an elegant hotel mixing classic architecture with modern amenities, and having free WiFi throughout. The hotel offers a large continental buffet breakfast, and a cosy library and lounge. Rooms at Stendhal Hotel are air conditioned and spacious, and include a free minibar. Decorated in light colours, they all feature satellite TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. You can read, watch TV, or enjoy a cocktail in hotel's comfortable lounge. You will also find a free 24-hour internet point with WiFi access and printer. This 4-star hotel is a 5-minute walk from both the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps. The designer shopping area around Via Condotti is also just 5 minutes away on foot. It has excellent links by metro and bus around Rome.

name: Palazzo Caruso
description: Situated in Rome's Piazza Barberini, Palazzo Caruso offers a terrace, free WiFi, and elegant air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The Trevi Fountain is 550 metres away. With coffered ceilings, all rooms include a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and an electric kettle. The bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is served every morning, including hot drinks, pastries, cold meat and cheese. Ciampino Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Fly Decó Hotel
address: Lungomare P. Toscanelli, 52a, 00122 Lido di Ostia, Rome
description: Facing the beachfront, Fly Decó Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Lido di Ostia and features a garden, terrace and bar. The property is located a few steps from Ostia Lido Beach, 2.4 km from Castel Fusano Beach and 19 km from Zoo Marine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, Italian or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. EUR Magliana Metro Station is 21 km from Fly Decó Hotel, while PalaLottomatica Arena is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Fiumicino Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Tmark Hotel Vaticano
description: With a stay at Tmark Hotel Vaticano in Rome (Rome City Centre), you'll be steps from Vatican Museums and 14 minutes by foot from St. Peter's Basilica. Featured amenities include limo/town car service, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Guests may use a cruise ship terminal shuttle for a surcharge, and limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Villafranca
description: Hotel Villafranca is in central Rome, 50 metres from Castro Pretorio Metro Station and 1 metro stop from Termini Train Station. An American breakfast is served each morning at this hotel featuring free WiFi throughout. Rooms have either a classic or modern design. All air-conditioned, they also feature a TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels, a small fridge and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Hotel Villafranca has excellent public transport links around Rome. The Coliseum and Roman Forum are just 5 minutes away by Metro. The neighbourhood has plenty of cafés and restaurants. Staff provide tourist information and reserve restaurants, tours or museum tickets.

name: Antico Albergo del Sole al Pantheon
description: Centrally located, Hotel Sole Al Pantheon offers easy access to Rome's popular shopping and sightseeing areas. This modern hotel is an ideal choice for discovering the local vineyards as it is situated in the Latium Wine Region. Hotel Sole Al Pantheon features a 24/7 reception, as well as free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms. For added convenience, it offers limited hours room service, a safe and porters. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to discover the best of the local nightlife. Hotel Sole Al Pantheon provides 32 air conditioned rooms. A mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a walk-in closet are also included. Enjoy a relaxing aperitif in the hotel's cosy lounge bar, before heading off to the restaurant for an evening meal. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood offers several bars and restaurants serving a range of varied cuisines. Rome's attractions, such as Trevi Fountain and Piazza Navona, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Sole Al Pantheon. It is within a short stroll from Pantheon.Revato

name: Hotel Oxford
description: Set in Rome’s most exclusive area, Hotel Oxford is set just behind Via Veneto and the Spanish Steps. Guest rooms feature elegant furnishings and wood or carpeted floors. Experience the real Dolce Vita in this elegant setting. The rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom, and some have a balcony. Apartments are also available, and are located in separate buildings in nearby Via Piave or Via Flavia. At the Oxford Hotel you have free internet terminals and free Wi-Fi in all areas. This hotel features 2 meeting rooms. Located inside the Oxford is Q'4RT, the property's café, restaurant and wine shop. They offer wine and olive oil tastings from an extensive gourmet selection, and are open every day for lunch and dinner. Start your day with an Italian buffet breakfast. In the evening, try some typical Roman cuisine at the traditional restaurant. Choose from a mix of fresh pasta, pizza, and meat and fish dishes. Save room for a delicious dessert or fresh seasonal fruit.

name: Relais Fontana di Trevi
description: Right next to the Trevi Fountain and with free WiFi throughout, the Relais serves breakfast out on its roof terrace overlooking the world-famous fountain. Rooms have an elegant design and come with air conditioning. Guest rooms are well equipped and include a TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee-making facilities. Each one has a private bathroom with hairdryer. Relais Fontana di Trevi is not only close to 1 of Rome's most famous fountains. The Spanish Steps and the Pantheon are less than 10 minutes away on foot. Fontana di Trevi Relais is surrounded by shops, cafés and traditional Roman restaurants. Barberini Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away. Please note that the main building features a lift, but guests will have to climb a few steps to reach it. Staff will help you with your luggage.

name: The Style
description: Just 400 metres from the Spanish Steps and Via Condotti, The Style is set in the heart of Rome's historic centre. The functional, en suite rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Featuring air conditioning, all rooms at the The Style come with modern furniture, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The private marble bathrooms are complete with large shower and hairdryer. The property is set in a historic building from the 19th century. A buffet breakfast is available daily in the lounge on the ground floor. It includes sweet and savoury items, hot and cold drinks, yoghurt. Lactose- and gluten-free products are available upon request. Located less than a 5-minute walk from Spagna Metro Station, The Style is 400 metres from the Trevi Fountain. The property is 100 metres from a bus stop with links to Roma Termini Train Station.

name: Hotel Garda
description: Housed in an elegant period building next to the Borghese Gardens, Hotel Garda offers a quiet location close to all Rome’s attractions and just around the corner from fabulous Via Veneto. Both the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain are a 5-minute walk away, and Via Condotti and Via del Corso shopping streets are also within easy walking distance. Just a few steps away you will find the Spagna Metro stop which will take you directly to St Peter’s square, as well as to the main train station. At the Garda Hotel you can relax in the TV lounge or library, or enjoy a drink at the bar. Multilingual staff is happy to help you with any matter, from providing information to reserving tickets or a table for you.

name: Hotel Duca d'Alba
description: Set 450 metres from the Roman Forum and the Coliseum in Rome, Hotel Duca D’Alba is housed in a 19th-century town house in the Monti district. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi throughout. Rooms have satellite flat-screen TV and a marble bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. This hotel with 24-hour reception is surrounded by ethnic shops, restaurants and bars. Cavour Metro Station, on line B, is just 50 metres away. The Trevi Fountain can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Casa Santa Sofia
address: Piazza Della Madonna Dei Monti 3, 00184 Rome
description: Conveniently located in Rome's city centre, 500 metres from the Coliseum, Casa Santa Sofia offers accommodation with free high-speed internet connection. Rooms at the property feature a private bathroom. Guests can also enjoy a glass of fine Italian wine and canapes or relax at the rooftop wine bar. Casa Santa Sofia is 250 metres from Cavour Metro Station, providing fast links with other areas in Rome. The main shopping street Via Del Corso can be reached on foot in 10 minutes.

name: Room Mate Filippo
description: Featuring a fitness centre, free WiFi, and a terrace, Room Mate Filippo offers elegant rooms 200 metres from Barberini Metro. The Spanish Steps are 500 metres from the property. All air conditioned and spacious, rooms here include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The Trevi Fountain is a 10-minute walk from the property, while Termini Station is 3 metro stops away.

name: Bv Oly Hotel
address: Via Santuario Regina Degli Apostoli, 36, 00145 Rome
description: BV Hotel Oly is in a quiet area of Rome's business district EUR, a 10-minute walk from San Paolo Metro Station. Free WiFi is provided in the entire hotel, which is less than 1 km from St. Paul's Basilica. Rooms at BV Hotel Oly are spacious and air conditioned. Each includes a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels, and a minibar. Your day at the BV Hotel Oly starts with a buffet breakfast of scrambled eggs and homemade cakes together with hot drinks and juices. Staff are always available to offer useful tourist and travel information. The Coliseum is just 4 metro stops away. Outdoor parking is free, while the indoor garage comes at an additional cost.

name: Hotel Shangri-La Roma
description: Located in Rome and with PalaLottomatica Arena reachable within 1.1 km, Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Built in 1969, this 4-star hotel is within 1.4 km of EUR Fermi Metro Station and 2.6 km of Laurentina Metro Station. The accommodation offers room service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, each room includes a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, all units at Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a terrace. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. EUR Magliana Metro Station is 3.4 km from Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels, while Basilica San Paolo Metro Station is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Borghese Contemporary Hotel
description: Borghese Contemporary Hotel, renewed this spring 2023, is set in the heart of historic Rome, a 5-minute walk from the popular shopping area around the Spanish Steps. It features a pretty inner courtyard. The Hotel is located inside an 18th century building previosly owned by the Borghese family. All rooms are equipped with Chromecast TV system and active USB charger. Reception is open 24 hours a day. Here you can book museum tickets and get lots of useful tourist information. The Pantheon and Piazza Navona are both around 10 minutes away on foot. Room automation and IPTV system Separate heating and air conditioning management in the bedroom.

name: Palazzo Manfredi
description: Admire an outstanding view of the Coliseum over breakfast at the rooftop terrace at Hotel Palazzo Manfredi. Rooms here are spacious and offer free Wi-Fi and Sky TV. With such a central location, a 2-minute walk from Colosseo Metro Station, getting around Rome is easy. Some units has a view of the ancient ruins along the Roman Forum. Other room amenities include a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a minibar and pay-per-view channels. Palazzo Manfredi also offers a self-catering option. The apartments are located in the same historic area of Rome and feature living rooms and kitchenettes. Cocktails and light snacks can also be served out on the terrace. If you really want to see Rome in style, you can rent a Lamborghini sports car from reception.

name: Hotel Imperatori
description: Near Rome's GRA ring road, Degli Imperatori features elegant rooms with free Wi-FI. Rooms at Hotel IMPERATORI also include air conditioning, satellite and digital LCD TV. The marble bathroom has either a bath or shower. Buffet breakfast is served from 07:00 until 10:30. Local buses stop just 20 metres from Degli Imperatori Hotel, and provide quick connection to the city’s metro. The Coliseum is a 15-minute metro ride away.

name: Hotel Lunetta
description: Offering a free spa centre and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 32” LCD TV, the 4-star Hotel Lunetta is in central Rome, just 200 metres from Piazza Navona. The top-floor terrace overlooks Rome’s rooftops. Rooms are air conditioned and soundproofed and have an elegant combination of black and white colours. Each one also comes with refined parquet floors and modern furniture. Some feature wood-beamed ceilings. A varied breakfast buffet is served in a small but colourful breakfast room until 10:30. It includes homemade cakes and croissants, along with cold cuts, cheese, scrambled eggs and bacon. The hotel bar is perfect for a drink or snack and is open until 14:00. Less than 100 metres from Campo De’ Fiori square, Lunetta Hotel is a 15-minute walk from St Peter’s Basilica. The Pantheon is 700 metres away.

name: Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George
description: Welcome to Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George. The hotel boasts a privileged position for discovering the wonders of the Eternal City. 5-star luxury boutique hotel located in the enchanting Via Giulia, in the heart of the historic center of Rome, a few steps from Piazza Navona, Campo de' Fiori, Castel Sant'Angelo and the Vatican Museums. 5-star luxury hotel Rome historic centre: Local inspiration. The boutique Hotel Indigo® Rome - St. George is characterized by an atmosphere full of charm and history. The ancient Renaissance walls surround the contemporary design environments and the modern interiors blend perfectly with important historical testimonies. The large travertine stones on the facade, which come from the Colosseum, recall the shape of modern sofas. The building's Renaissance style and travertine marble walls decorate the lobby, restaurant and bar, all examples of great eras. During the summer season, I Sofà Bar Restaurant & Roof Terrace moves to the panoramic terrace of the hotel, offering a breathtaking view over the roofs and monuments of Rome. Our chef chooses 0 km products and offers tasty "Roman" recipes, preferring products of the season. Treat yourself to some relaxation in the St. George Spa, the hotel's wellness centre, consisting of a sauna, Turkish bath, large whirlpool tub and mini-gym. From this boutique hotel you can discover the delightful shops of Rione Regola.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Relais Trevi 95 Boutique Hotel
description: Set in the historical centre of Rome, Relais Trevi 95 Boutique Hotel is a design hotel just 150 metres from the Trevi Fountain. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a 32-inch LCD TV and free WiFi. The Trevi 95 is just opposite the Quirinale presidential palace and an 8-minute walk from the Pantheon. The hotel is a 5-minute walk to Barberini Metro Station for direct trains to the Vatican City and Termini Train Station. Rooms have elegant furnishings and parquet floors. Each includes air conditioning, a minibar, international channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. An American buffet breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room or on the terrace. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail on the rooftop terrace. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and staff can give tourist advice and arrange airport transfers.

name: Hotel Verona Rome
address: Via Di Santa Maria Maggiore 154, 00185 Rome
description: Hotel Verona Rome is located a few steps from the Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore. You can walk to both Roma Termini Train Station and the Coliseum. Rooms are elegant and air-conditioned. Each room features a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer, tiled floors, and classic furniture. The Verona Rome is a family-run hotel. Staff are available around the clock to assist you with renting vehicles, booking guided tours, and any need you might have.

name: Triviho Hotel
description: Well set in Rome, Triviho Hotel provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Triviho Hotel offers certain rooms with city views, and every room is equipped with a kettle. All units include a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Repubblica - Teatro dell'Opera Metro Station, Piazza Barberini and Barberini Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from Triviho Hotel.

name: Hotel Savoy
description: Set in a renovated historical building, the Savoy offers a rooftop bar with panoramic views across the Eternal City and free WiFi throughout. Spagna Metro Station is 400 metres away. This private residence was converted into a hotel in 1920 and preserves its original style. You are greeted by the courteous and professional staff in the spacious lobby, complete with glass chandeliers and marble floors. All air conditioned, the elegant en suite rooms come with a satellite LCD TV, and a minibar. Some rooms offer extra space and luxury toiletries. An extensive sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is available daily. The à la carte restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine made with fresh, seasonal ingredients. A wide selection of fine Italian wines is also available. Piazza Barberini square is 450 metres from the property, while the Trevi Fountain can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Hassler Roma
description: Set at the top of the Spanish Steps, Hassler Roma is one of the city's most famous hotels. It offers elegant rooms and suites with high-speed free WiFi, and free wellness facilities including a sauna, Turkish bath and gym. Its restaurant and gym have panoramic views over Rome's rooftops. Dining options at the Hassler include the Michelin-starred Imàgo on the 6th floor, the stylish Salone Eva, and the Palm Court restaurant with its ancient stone walls. The cuisine is classic Italian, with international specialities. Rooms at the Hassler feature a satellite TV and air conditioning. All units are classically furnished and some have a large seating area with a sofa. The Hassler is a 5-minute walk from Spagna Metro, while chic Via dei Condotti is just 170 metres away. The hotel's free electric shuttle takes guests to shops in the surrounding area.

name: Residenza Frattina
description: No description found

name: Palazzo Nainer
description: Set in one of the exclusive streets which lead from Piazza del Popolo to the Spanish Steps, Palazzo Nainer is an elegant boutique hotel providing excellent service and beautiful interiors. Built in the early 19th century, Palazzo Nainer is now surrounded by antique shops, art galleries and designer stores. A short walk will take you to Villa Borghese Park and two of Rome's most famous churches are just around the corner. Palazzo Nainer has a lovely rooftop garden. Sit out here and bask in the sun for a while or just enjoy the views over Rome's historic centre. Many of the hotel's comfortable and well-equipped rooms also come with their own balconies and charming views. Palazzo Nainer is perfect for staying in shape after enjoying Rome's culinary offerings. There is also an American bar here where you can enjoy an aperitif.

name: Hotel Museum
description: This family-run hotel is located opposite the Vatican Museums and the entrance to the Sistine Chapel. The sun terrace offers views of St. Peter’s Basilica. Each guest room at Hotel Museum features air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels, and free WiFi access. The décor is classic, with wallpaper and wooden furniture. When booking a room with a breakfast included option a generous buffet breakfast is available daily. During pleasant weather it is served on the terrace. The hotel is near many restaurants and bars. Cipro Metro Station is just 300 metres away. Guests have discounted rates at a nearby private garage parking.

name: Hotel Diocleziano
description: Offering a free gym with sauna, Hotel Diocleziano is opposite Termini Train Station and next to the Terme di Diocleziano ancient Roman baths. Its elegant rooms feature a free Wi-Fi and a paid mini bar. Rooms here have a classic design with carpeted floors. Each one is air conditioned and includes tea and coffee-making. You will also have a digital safe and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Snacks are not available at the bar. The Diocleziano Hotel is set in a 19th-century building in the heart of Rome. Staff can offer tourist information, book museum tickets and arrange massages. There is also a free internet point. A varied hot and cold buffet is served for breakfast and includes fresh fruit, cold cuts, and cakes. Snacks and drinks are available from the bar, which is open until 23:30. Being so close to Termini means you have excellent transport links around Rome and to both international airports. The Coliseum and Trevi Fountain are 2 metro stops away.

name: Eitch Borromini Palazzo Pamphilj
address: Via di Santa Maria dell Anima, 30, 00186 Rome
description: Boasting a panoramic terrace with views of Piazza Navona, St. Peter's Basilica and the Pantheon, Eitch Borromini Palazzo Pamphilj is set in a historical building from the 17th-Century, designed by Francesco Borromini. It offers spacious accommodation with free WiFi. The rooms and suites are elegantly decorated and feature modern details as well as original features of the building. They come with original frescoes, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom includes Etro toiletries. Guests can start their day with a rich continental breakfast including jams, fresh fruits, cold cuts and pastries. Italian flavours and seafood dishes are also served at the à la carte restaurant. Eitch Borromini Palazzo Pamphilj is centrally located. The Pantheon, Campo de' Fiori and Castel Sant'Angelo can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

name: Hotel Nautilus
description: Set on the second floor of a historic building in Rome's popular Prati district, Nautilus is on a quiet street 5 minutes' walk from both Lepanto and Ottaviano metro stations. Saint Peter's Basilica and the Vatican Museums are just 10 minutes' walk away. The neighbourhood is full of some of Rome's most popular shops, wine bars and restaurants. Rooms at Hotel Nautilus are all individually designed and have different amenities. They all come with either a fan or air conditioning and have a bathroom with shower. Some have a minibar, safe or LCD TV. Nautilus Hotel has a TV lounge and a breakfast room, although breakfast can be served to your room on request.

name: Residenza Paolo VI
description: Offering panoramic views of Saint Peter's Square from its rooftop terrace, Residenza Paolo VI is a converted monastery with free WiFi. Just metres from Saint Peter's, the property is 15 minutes' walk from the Vatican Museums. Classically furnished and all air conditioned, rooms here have an LCD TV with satellite channels, tiled or wooden floors, and elegant rugs. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Breakfast at Paolo VI is an extensive sweet and savoury buffet including scrambled eggs, cheese, cereal and yoghurt. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed up on the terrace, with great views of the Apostolic Palace. The Residenza is 700 metres from both Castel Sant'Angelo castle and the river Tiber. It has excellent bus and metro links around Rome, with the 40 Express bus stopping nearby.

name: Colonna Suite del Corso
description: No description found

name: Boutique Hotel Campo de' Fiori
description: Boutique Hotel Campo de' Fiori is located in a corner of one of the city's most popular squares, and features a roof garden with views of the historic centre. This hotel designed by Dario DeBlasi offers rooms and self-catering apartments with free Wi-Fi, The unique rooms at Campo De' Fiori Hotel offer individually controlled air conditioning, soundproofing. and a satellite LCD TV. Apartments are located in different historic buildings around the square and also feature a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel's terrace has wicker furniture and a 360° view of Rome. During the day the square features a traditional fruit and vegetable market, and it is buzzing with bars and restaurants at night.

name: Vittoriano Suite
description: No description found

name: Kolbe Hotel Rome
description: Overlooking the Palatine Hill, Kolbe Hotel Rome combines medieval arches, exposed brickwork and a courtyard restaurant. It has an enviable location in the heart of historic Rome. Medieval interiors mix with contemporary furnishings such as the leather couches and plasma-screen TVs in the hotel lobby. Some rooms have exposed brick walls and high arched ceilings from the 15th century. The also include air conditioning, satellite TV and Wi-Fi access. A varied hot and cold buffet is available at breakfast. The Unique Al Palatino Garden Restaurant serves Roman and Italian dishes, which can be enjoyed on the patio overlooking the garden. Located next to a Franciscan friary, Kolbe Hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Coliseum and the popular area of Trastevere, just across the Tiber River. The hotel is very well connected by both tourist and local buses.

name: Hotel La Giocca
description: Located along Via Salaria just off Exit 8 of Rome's GRA orbital motorway, La Giocca is a modern hotel composed of 2 separate buildings, and offers free parking, a free outdoor pool, and a lush garden. Free WiFi is available throughout. Fitted with parquet floors, rooms here feature individually controlled air conditioning, an interactive satellite LCD TV and a minibar. The private bathroom has a bath or a shower. Hotel La Giocca features a reading room and bar. A buffet-style breakfast is served in the main building between 07:00 and 10:00. Guests can relax by the pool which is equipped with sun loungers and parasols. The adjacent Pappa Reale Restaurant serves high-quality cuisine with beef and fish specialities for lunch and dinner. Guests can enjoy outdoor dining in fine weather.

name: Hotel Ristorante Villa Icidia
description: Set in its spacious garden, Villa Icidia is housed in a refurbished 16th-century ancient Roman villa. It is 4 km from Frascati and it offers a gourmet restaurant and large rooms with a private bathroom. The rooms are provided with air conditioning and classic décor. Each is equipped with an LCD TV with satellite channels, and a bathroom with shower. A buffet-style breakfast is served daily in the dining room, and it includes a selection of sweet products. The restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Ciampino Airport is 10 km from the property. Cinecittà Metro Station is a 10-minute drive away.

name: c-hotels Fiume
description: Boasting a rooftop terrace with city views, Hotel Fiume is located in Piazza Fiume 10 minutes' walk from both glamorous via Veneto street and Villa Borghese park. Rooms come with a satellite flat-screen TV, and WiFi is free throughout. All air conditioned, rooms have elegant parquet floors and a private bathroom with shower. The buffet breakfast at Fiume Hotel includes bacon and eggs, cold meats, and cheese, together with fresh fruit, cakes and pastries. The multilingual staff can provide recommendations on what to visit and how to get around. Castro Pretorio Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Canova
description: Located near the basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore, Hotel Canova is a 10-minute walks from the Coliseum. Termini Station is just 600 metres away At Canova Hotel, guests can enjoy the nearby Roman Forum. Metro and bust stations, wine bars and restaurants are available in the surroundings.

name: Lombardia40 Luxury suites
description: No description found

name: c-hotels Club House Roma
description: Hotel Club House Roma is in a quiet area, 100 metres from Rome's Cornelia Metro Station and 3 stops from the Vatican City. Rooms offer air conditioning, free WiFi and satellite TV. Breakfast is a buffet of fresh cakes and pastries. The Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps are a 10-minute metro ride from the Club House. Multilingual staff is available 24-hours a day to offer tourist information. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. The modern rooms at Club House Roma Hotel are decorated in warm colours. Each room has a private bathroom equipped with hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony. The bar serves a range of refreshing wines, exotic cocktails and snacks. The Vatican Museums are 2 metro stops away.
